mapper.select: select e.ORDER_ID from e_order e where e.status=10211006 and e.driver_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert:
insert into E_LOCATION ( LOCATION_ID, ORDER_ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_CODE, CONMENT, LOGITUDE, LATITUDE, ADDRESS, UP_TYPE, TYPE )values
(getPrimary(), #{ORDER_ID}, #{project_name}, #{project_code}, now(), #{logitude}, #{latitude}, #{address}, 10231002, 10241002)
mapper.select: select u.* from sys_user u where u.user_id =#{user_id}
